message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I think $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $160?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $145?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $155?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not comfortable with $155. Would you be willing to go down to $150?
I've made some concessions already, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $152. This is my final offer, Bob. What do you think?
I understand this is your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me halfway between $152 and $120, at $136?
I'm not willing to go that low, Bob. I'll meet you halfway between $152 and $136, but I need to make a profit. How about $144?
I'm still not comfortable with $144. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product, but that's as low as I can go.
